author: Megan Armstrong
title: Ducks Owners to Pay Part-Time Employees Through June 30 Amid Coronavirus
description: Part-time employees of  Anaheim Ducks  owners Henry and Susan Samueli's sports and event management companies will continue to be paid through June 30 "for current or future rescheduled, postponed or canceled events," the Ducks  announced  on Thursday...
content: Part-time employees of Anaheim Ducks owners Henry and Susan Samueli's sports and event management companies will continue to be paid through June 30 "for current or future rescheduled, postponed or canceled events," the Ducks announced on Thursday. "The Samue… [+1643 chars]
